commandDescription:
Uses git diff to get the latest changes to deploy
The local working copy must be tracked in a git repo.
outputDirFlagDescription: Output dir to put the files to be deployed.
projectFolderFlagDescription: Project folder to get the files to be deployed.
includeUntrackedFlagDescription: If you wish to include untracked files.
deployDescription: Set to true if you want the deployment to be done after placing the files in the output folder.
